section.p: Custom PDF2 shell stylesheets need to be revised to not include separate IBM and OASIS DITA stylesheets. The *_1.0.xsl stylesheets have been removed and their imports must be removed from shell stylesheets.

Main FO generation now relies on merging process to rewrite duplicate IDs. The default merging has done this already in previous releses, but now also custom merging needs to fullfill the duplicate ID rewrite requirement.
